dublinCore.dc:title: 113 SRES 20 ATS: Designating Chairman of the Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Reid submitted the following resolution; which was considered and agreed to

form.official-title: Designating Chairman of the Senate Committee on Foreign Relations.

section.text: The Senator from New Jersey, Mr. Menendez, shall be the Chairman of the Committee on Foreign Relations for the One Hundred Thirteenth Congress, or until his successor is chosen.
Provided, That this resolution shall be effective upon the resignation of the Senator from Massachusetts (Mr. Kerry).
